name: Yochat: Make Friends in Random Video Chat
description: On Yochat, you can have a live random video chat with strangers and friends! If youve ever thought about venturing out of your social circle, Yochat is offering a new platform for you to meet friends worldwide.   Features Youll Love  - Simple & Fast Video Chat  Dont be shy! Showcase the best you! Get to know new people in the simplest way. Tap on the screen to video chat with friends from different parts of the world.  - Stress-free Text Chat  When you find yourself short of words or terribly shy, you can text to show your feelings or send a fun sticker to ease the embarrassment.  - Real-time Translation  Wanna make friends with someone from another culture? Sure! The messages you send to each other will be translated instantly.  - Meaningful Social Connection  On Yochat, youre no longer just random strangers to one another. You may even develop a profound friendship here. No worries, you can keep in touch with your new buddies on Yochat for as long as you want.  Are you ready to meet the world and have some fun with friends? Come join us on Yochat, an app youll love.   Privacy Policy: - In Yochat video chat app, all personal information is securely stored and information other than what you write directly on the profile cannot be seen by other users. - Please take caution when delivering sensitive information, because you are responsible for the information you provide to the other party once you connect through Yochat chat video. - Sexual, pornographic, or nude behaviors are not allowed and users generating them will be immediately banned.
